formattedAddress: 120 Riverside Blvd, New York, NY 10069, USA
adrFormatAddress: 120 Riverside Blvd, New York, NY 10069-0501, USA

originalText.text: We recently rented a cello from Rental Instruments for my daughter’s performance in NY. As we live in HK and would be difficult to bring our own cello and we also wanted to find a place that is conveniently picking up and dropping off the instruments as we won’t have a car during our stay in Manhattan and a place not too far from Mid-Town. I googled and found Rental Instruments. And had few emails exchange with them and the overall rental process is pretty straightforward and simple.  When we got our first cello, my daughter didn’t quite like it and they were nice to allow us to swap and send over another cello. Return is easy by dropping off at a security desk at a residential apartment in NYC. I would recommend this place for anyone who would like to rent instruments while traveling to NYC. Their staff is professional and responsive and the quality and sound of their instruments are good.

originalText.text: Very friendly staff & fast service! I have been using this service for my kids for the past 2 years ! The rental  price is very fair too !
